content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'chcl')  

    CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [chcl]  

    WITH ( 

        LOCATION   = 'https://navispowerbidatastorage2.dfs.core.windows.net/chcl',  

    ) 

Go 

create or ALTER  view  move_history
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/move',
        data_source = 'chcl',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [move_history];

create or ALTER  view  decking_history
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/decking',
        data_source = 'chcl',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [decking_history];

create or ALTER  view  violation
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/violation',
        data_source = 'chcl',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [violation];

create view dual_cycling_test
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/dual_cycling_test',
        data_source = 'sgtd',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [dual_cycling_test];

create view dual_cycling_yard_test
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/dual_cycling_yard_test',
        data_source = 'sgtd',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [dual_cycling_yard_test];

as
select *

    OPENROWSET(

as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/jobstep_test',

    ) AS [jobstep_test];

as
select *
FROM

        BULK 'gold/rehandle_test',

create view tt_productivity_test
as
select *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/tt_productivity_test',

    ) AS [tt_productivity_test];
